mapper.select: select seq, bizcd, price, subject, writer_id, content, register_date, update_date, consent, writer_name, consent_date, delete_at, (select biznm from tb_company c where c.bizcd = e.bizcd) as biznm from tb_estimate e where delete_at = 0 and bizcd = #{bizcd} order by register_date desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
select nvl(max(seq), 0) +1 as seq from tb_estimate ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY
mapper.insert: insert into tb_estimate( seq ,bizcd ,price ,subject ,writer_id ,writer_name ,content ,register_date ,consent ,delete_at ) values ( (select nvl(max(seq), 0) +1 as seq from tb_estimate ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY) ,#{bizcd} ,#{price} ,#{subject} ,#{writer_id} ,#{writer_name} ,#{content} ,now() ,0 ,0 )
mapper.update: update tb_estimate set delete_at = 1 where seq = #{seq}
update tb_estimate set consent = #{consent}, consent_date = now() where seq=#{seq}
